summary:
We have to infer class responsibilities from method names and docstring. Class name CustomModel. Methods: __init__, cloudformation_type, create_from_cloudformation_json, get_cfn_attribute, has_cfn_attr, is_created, physical_resource_id, set_data. This suggests a model representing a custom resource in AWS CloudFormation, handling creation from CFN JSON, providing attribute access, tracking creation status, resource ID, and storing data. Business intent: to encapsulate a custom CloudFormation resource's state and behavior, enabling creation, attribute retrieval, and data management within infrastructure-as-code workflows. Keywords: cloudformation, custom resource, model, attribute, creation, resource id, data, helper, getter, setter.
